definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
barramundi or Asian sea bass (Lates calcarifer)
Barramundi/Lates calcarifer (a species of catadromous fish in family Latidae of order Perciformes)
(Tw) giant mottled eel (Anguilla marmorata), aka swamp eel or marbled eel/(coll.) (alternative for the nearly homonymous 流氓[liu2 mang2]) gangster

sentences.english: In humid conditions , it can survive on land for several days.
sentences.chinese: 在潮湿的环境中，攀鲈可于陆地上存活数天。

sentences.english: Any of about 100 species of small, slender freshwater fishes (family Percidae), native to eastern North America.
sentences.chinese: 鲈形目鲈科镖鲈亚科约一百种小型细长淡水鱼的统称。

sentences.english: The fish, smallmouth and largemouth bass, were male but nevertheless carried immature eggs.
sentences.chinese: 这种小口黑鲈和黑鲈为雄性，却带有未成熟的卵子。

sentences.english: The fish, smallmouth and largemouth bass, were male but nevertheless carried immature eggs.
sentences.chinese: 这种小口黑鲈和黑鲈为雄性，却带有未成熟的卵子。

sentences.english: Saugers have a fusiform body structure.
sentences.chinese: 北美凸鲈有着梭状的体型。
在冬天莓鲈翻车鱼移动深深。

sentences.english: The dam would also destroy the snail darter's habitat.
sentences.chinese: 这座大坝也会毁坏食蜗镖鲈的生存环境。

sentences.english: I'm a student of Luxiang Experimental Primary School. We are good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我是鲈乡实验小学的学生，我们是好朋友。

sentences.english: And small mouth bass have got me hooked on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 我爱礼拜日下午钓鱼看黑鲈吃鱼饵上钩。

sentences.english: In summer crappie will suspend in deeper water chasing shad.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天莓鲈翻车鱼在追逐美洲河鲱的深水将暂停。

sentences.english: A freshwater fish of the family Anabantidae, native to Africa and southeast Asia and including the gourami and climbing perch.
sentences.chinese: 攀鲈一种攀鲈科淡水鱼，产于非洲和东南亚，包括。

sentences.english: Casting rods are the meat and potatoes of the bass fishing world.
sentences.chinese: 枪柄竿对钓鲈来说，是最基本的。

sentences.english: I'd love the sea bass but can I have it with a simple white wine sauce?
sentences.chinese: 我想吃海鲈，但可否帮我把海鲈搭配简单的白酒酱汁？

sentences.english: I'd love the sea bass but can I have it with a simple white wine sauce?
sentences.chinese: 我想吃海鲈，但可否帮我把海鲈搭配简单的白酒酱汁？

sentences.english: Any of several pike-like fishes of the perch family.
sentences.chinese: 河鲈中几种貌似长矛的鱼。

sentences.english: But I publicly apologise to the sea bass of Britain.
sentences.chinese: 不过我已经公开向英国黑鲈道歉了。

definition: see 鱠魚|鲙鱼[kuai4 yu2]/variant of 膾|脍[kuai4]
see 鰟鮍|鳑鲏, small carp
